description: Cross-site request forgery (CSRF) vulnerability in EasyBlocks IPv6 Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier and Enterprise Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier allows remote attackers to hijack the authentication of administrators via unspecified vectors.

enisaIdProduct.product_version: Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier, and Enterprise Ver. 2.0.1 and earlier
